name: The Life Of The Roberts Family Quiz | Television | 15 Questions

questions.text: Bud named his second son after a character from what show?
questions.explanation:
Star Trek.

	In "Secret Agent Man", James Kirk Roberts was revealed to Big Bud and Mike Roberts. It was Mike that realized the baby was named after Captain Kirk on "Star Trek". Harriet thought Bud gave the baby the name because it was a strong name.

questions.text: When Mike Roberts was being court-martialed in "Surface Warfare" for a live fire mishap, who was the first to represent him?
questions.explanation:
Bud.

	Mike's arrest sets off a series of funny events which ended up bringing Mac, Harm, the SecNav, Webb, and the Admiral to his rescue. In the end, Petty Officer Third Class Mike Roberts was found innocent.

questions.text: When did Bud and Harriet first meet?
questions.explanation:
Season two.

	Bud and Harriet met on board the USS Seahawk in "Crossing The Line". Ensign Simms held the same position Bud had when he was on the Seahawk. Bud revealed in "Adrift" that he had plans with Mike on the weekend he was supposed to be working with Commander Rabb and Colonel Mackenzie.

questions.text: What was one of the excuses that Big Bud used to keep from being recalled into active duty?
options: He was a sole provider for his family
questions.explanation:
He was gay.

	After making excuses for why he didn't or couldn't go to Iraq, Big Bud was finally released from the recall and told they wouldn't be recalling him again. After that, he decided to teach military supply officers in Georgia.

Florida.

	Bud met Harriet's parents in "Yesterday's Heroes" when they all went down to work a case in Florida. When Harriet told Mac her parents lived in Naples, Mac thought she meant they lived in Italy.

True.

	Bud and Diane Schonke were first seen together in "Skeleton Crew", but Bud mentioned that "she was a lot more fun" to Mac in "Death Watch".

questions.text: In the series finale, Mike told Bud and Harm he was in love with whom?
questions.explanation:
Cameron Cresswell.

	When Mike told Bud and Harm that he was in love with Cameron Cresswell, he received some funny reactions such as Bud telling him "Fall out of love," and Harm asking "Have you lost your mind?"

questions.text: Was Big Bud arrested on the eve of Bud's wedding?
questions.explanation:
No.

	The only three arrested from JAG Headquarters were Bud, Harm, and the Admiral. Mac bailed them out.

questions.text: What year did Harriet and Bud lose baby Sarah?
questions.explanation:
2000.

	Harriet found out she was pregnant in "Promises" and the baby was revealed to be a girl in "Legacy". Harriet and Bud asked Mac if they could name their daughter Sarah in "JAG TV", and Bud revealed to the Admiral that they lost baby Sarah in "The Princess and The Petty Officer". Baby Sarah's gravestone was laid in "Family Secrets".

questions.text: The doctor that told Harriet she was pregnant with her third child was dressed up as whom?
questions.explanation:
Santa Claus.

	Harriet had a severe case of food poisoning after eating left over Chinese food so Bud had to drive her to the hospital. While there, the doctor (dressed as Santa) told her that she was pregnant.

questions.text: After getting off the phone with Harriet's answering machine, a very drunk Bud got up and sang a song. What was the title of the song he sang?
questions.explanation:
Delilah.

	Bud sang a perfect rendition of "Delilah" by Tom Jones and even sounded like the singer. While Bud was singing, Mac sat at the table laughing hysterically.

questions.text: Where was little AJ when he ran away?
questions.explanation:
Arcade.

	Little AJ was with Mike when he ran away from the arcade. He ran away because he was upset that his mom and dad were spending more time with the baby than with him.

questions.text: What season ended with Bud stepping on a land mine?
questions.explanation:
Seven.

	Bud was trying to get a young boy to come out of the mine field when he stepped on a mine. In the eighth season opener, "Critical Condition", a reporter reported on TV that the boy Bud was trying to help knew where all the land mines were hidden.

questions.text: Harriet was excited when Bud told her they could have a chance to go to London or San Diego.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The first word out of Harriet's mouth was a loud "No!" Harriet later explained to Mac that she would be more comfortable having Bud closer to his doctors and therapists at Bethesda.

questions.text: In the series finale, Mac was the first one to ask Bud if he would like to go with her to San Diego.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Harm was the first to ask Bud to go with him to London after inquiring about his family and health. Not knowing Harm had asked him, Mac asked him as well.
